invoice_notes:
First invoice for work completed and deposits due for remodeling at 950 Hosbrook including: 
-Reroof East including structural repairs, skylights, and TPO roofing, all completed except coping and ventilation fan. 
-Masonry work including a total of 19 lintels, rebuding SE corner of building, and extensive tuckpointing. 
-Demolition and disposal of non-structural elements of W section of building. 
-Deposit to electrican to begin service upgrades. 
-Overbudget items include replacement of roof decking, additional framing materials to repair around skylights (upgraded beams from 16" to 24" as per engineering), and 10 additional lintels after demolition exposed many more as damaged.
